wikipedia_page.main: Robert Simpson (15 September 1915 – 13 January 1994), generally known as Bobby Simpson, was an English footballer who made 109 appearances in the Football League playing for Darlington and Hartlepools United either side of the Second World War. An outside forward, he also played non-league football for West Auckland Town and Stockton.

response: Robert, Bob or Bobby Simpson may refer to:
* Bobby Simpson (Home and Away), soap opera character
* Bobby Simpson (golfer), Scottish golfer who played as a pro in the United States in the early 1900s
* Bobby Simpson (footballer, born 1888) (1888– after 1913), English footballer
* Bobby Simpson (ice hockey) (born 1956), former NHL ice hockey player
